title: How to Unsend a Message in Twitter

steps.title: Open X.
steps.content: Open X. This app icon looks like a white X on a black background. You can find it on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap the envelope icon.
steps.content: Tap the envelope icon. It's in the bottom right corner of your screen and will open your DMs.

steps.title: Tap a conversation from which you want to delete a message.
steps.content: Tap a conversation from which you want to delete a message. The conversation will open to reveal all the messages you've sent.

steps.title: Tap and hold a message you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap and hold a message you want to delete. You can release your finger from the screen when a menu pops up.

steps.title: Tap Delete message for you.
steps.content: Tap Delete message for you . You can't delete or unsend the message, so the only thing you can do is delete the message from your account. If you want to delete an entire conversation on Android, go to your DM inbox and long-tap a conversation you want to delete (including all the messages in that conversation). When the menu pops up, select Delete conversation . If you want to delete an entire conversation on an iPhone, go to your DM inbox and swipe left on the conversation, then tap the trashcan icon. steps.title: Go to https://twitter.com/home and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://twitter.com/home and log in. You can use any desktop web browser to delete DMs.

steps.title: Click Messages.
steps.content: Click Messages . It's in the panel on the left side of the browser page and is next to an icon of an envelope.

steps.title: Click the conversation from which you want to delete a DM.
steps.content: Click the conversation from which you want to delete a DM. You'll see the person (or multiple people if it's a group conversation) to whom you've sent a DM in the center panel while the right-most panel shows the conversation and all the messages that have been sent in that conversation.

steps.title: Hover your mouse over a message and click ••• .
steps.content: Hover your mouse over a message and click ••• . The three-dot menu icon will appear when you mouse over a message in a conversation.

steps.title: Click Delete for you.
steps.content: Click Delete for you . You can't delete or unsend the message, so the only thing you can do is delete the message from your account. To leave a group conversation, click the icon in the top right corner of the group's message panel and select Leave conversation .
